enWisdom: Rewarding good with evil is [the highest form of] ingratitude

Wisdom: إِنَّ كُفْرَ النِّعْمَةِ لُؤْمٌ وَمُصَاحَبَةَ الْجَاهِلِ شُؤْمٌ
enWisdom: Verily ingratitude for blessings is vileness and accompanying the ignorant is [a cause of] misfortune
The bane of blessings is ingratitude

Wisdom: شَرُّ النَّاسِ مَنْ لَا يَشْكُرُ النِّعْمَةَ وَلَا يَرْعَى الْحُرْمَةَ
enWisdom: The worst person is one who does not give thanks for blessings and does not respect the inviolable boundaries [of others]

Wisdom: كُفْرُ النِّعْمَةِ لُؤْمٌ وَصُحْبَةُ الْأَحْمَقِ شُؤْمٌ
enWisdom: Ungratefulness for a blessing is vileness, and accompanying a fool is [a cause of] misfortune
The one who is unthankful for blessings is ungrateful for the bounty of Allah
Ingratitude for blessings is the thing that brings [divine] retribution

Wisdom: كَافِرُ النِّعْمَةِ مَذْمُومٌ عِنْدَ الْخَالِقِ وَالْخَلَائِقِ
enWisdom: The one who is ungrateful for blessings is dispraised in the sight of the Creator and the creation
Ingratitude for blessings is not a success [rather it is a failure]

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَعَانَ بِالنِّعْمَةِ عَلَى الْمَعْصِيَةِ فَهُوَ الْكَفُورُ
enWisdom: One who takes the help of a blessing [in order] to sin is indeed an ingrate

Wisdom: مَنْ كَفَرَ حُسْنَ الصَّنِيعَةِ اسْتَوْجَبَ قُبْحَ الْقَطِيعَةِ
enWisdom: One who is ungrateful for a good turn deserves an ugly separation

Wisdom: مَنْ أَنْعَمَ عَلَى الْكَفُورِ طَالَ غَيْظُهُ
enWisdom: One who bestows a favour on the ungrateful one prolongs his rage

Wisdom: مَنْ كَفَرَ النِّعَمَ حَلَّتْ بِهِ النِّقَمُ
enWisdom: Whoever is ungrateful for blessings, [divine] retribution comes upon him

Wisdom: لَا تُضِعْ نِعْمَةً مِنْ نِعَمِ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ عِنْدَكَ وَلْيُرَ عَلَيْكَ أَثَرُ مَا أَنْعَمَ اللَّهُ بِهِ عَلَيْكَ
enWisdom: Do not waste any of the blessings that Allah, the Glorified, has blessed you with, and let the effect of what He has blessed you with be visible on you
There is no blessing with ingratitude
